record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - March 03, 2008)

[Page: S1484]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Melissa Zolkeply, an intern for the Senate Commerce Committee, be granted floor privileges during the consideration of S. 2663.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

The Chair, on behalf of the Vice President, pursuant to the provisions of S. Con. Res. 67, 110th Congress, appoints the following Senators to the Joint Congressional Committee on Inaugural Ceremonies: the Senator from Nevada, Mr. Reid, the Senator from California, Mrs. Feinstein, and the Senator from Utah, Mr. Bennett.
